com.rattat.micro.game.aster.elements
Class FloatingObject

java.lang.Object
  com.rattat.micro.game.aster.elements.FloatingObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Asteroid, ExplodingPolygon, FlyingSaucer, Missile, SpaceShip
public class FloatingObject
extends java.lang.Object

A base class providing the functionality for and object which can float in space and have forces applied to it. Acceleration, velocity and position are updated when the update() method is called.

Subclasses may override onUpdate() to be notified when an update has taken place.

Author:
william@rattat.com

Constructor Detail

FloatingObject

Method Detail

update

public void update()

Update the position of the FloatingObject based on forces

Apply resultant force, update acceleration, speed and position.

Calls onUpdate() after forces, acceleration, velocity and position have been updated. This method can be used by subclasses to perform actions after the update.

See Also:
onUpdate()

impulseForce

public void impulseForce(Vector2D impulse)

Apply an impulse force to the object

That is, not a constant force, but a one off "push" like a person jumping off the ground

Parameters:
impulse -
See Also:
constantForce( Vector2D force )

constantForce

public void constantForce(Vector2D force)

Apply a constant force to the object

That is, not an impulse force, but a constant force, like the thruster on a rocket.

Parameters:
impulse -
See Also:
constantForce( Vector2D force )
